tabs.label: Equipment
tabs.description: Weapons, armor, and gear based on STR
tabs.emptySlotMessage: No equipment slots. Increase STR attribute to add slots.

tabs.label: Consumables
tabs.description: Potions, scrolls, and consumable items based on DEX
tabs.emptySlotMessage: No consumable slots. Increase DEX attribute to add slots.

tabs.label: Experience
tabs.description: Knowledge, skills, and training based on INT
tabs.emptySlotMessage: No experience bank slots. Increase INT attribute to add slots.

tabs.label: Custom Configged
tabs.description: Custom inventory tab defined in config
tabs.emptySlotMessage: No custom slots. Adjust attributes to add slots.
